answers.answer: I can only answer for myself- I don't have much in the way of hallucinations.  I believe I may have had one with medication before, not sure.  Sometimes, though I think I hear family saying something, but they say no.  Has she had an EEG done?

question: Does anyone suffer from hallucinations and have dysautonomia? My sister is recently diagnosed with dysautonomia and also has brittle diabetes, she is recently suffering from hallucinations and she is not taking sleeping pills.
title: Dysautonomia symptom
